body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. New York native. Married to Phebe B. Dayton. Father of Cary Dayton, Louisa Dayton, Samuel C. Dayton, Mariah Dayton, Aeberlon [?] Dayton, Alfonso Dayton, and Martha E. Dayton. Farmer in Campbell County in 1850. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860.
